tweets.text: @EnvAgencyMids @ClareDinnisEA @MPGeorgeEustice @AaronBell4NUL @StinkStopthe @stopthestink Whilst fresh air is imperative to curbing covid, the town of Newcastle has to suffer with obnoxious gases and odour seeping into the wide area, homes and schools daily. How is this right?
@ClareDinnisEA, @JamesBevanEA , @EnvAgencyMids & @DefraGovUK, please can you share your definition of ‚Äòannoyance‚Äô? https://t.co/s6kr8UVhx5

Massive props to @frazer_HX who leaves @EnvAgency this week for exciting new adventures. Keep an eye on this cat... 

Frazer has done more than nearly any human in the UK to advance emergency alerting to save lives.

Thanks mate. Hell of a legacy you're leaving behind... üôåüèº

urls.title: Aaron Bell MP
urls.description: WALLEY'S QUARRY - UPDATE Down in Westminster, I have been speaking both Defra advisers and Minister Rebecca Pow. I will be speaking with the Environment Agency later today. It is my understanding...

tweets.text: @seasonalight Unfortunately we are unable to take and log reports via Twitter. When reported to our incident team they will take all the details they need from you, issue you a reference number for updates and allocate the report onto the relevant area team to look into the matter. Thanks

The residents of #NewcastleunderLyme are suffering from the noxious gases & leachate oozing from #Walleys Landfill. Please help us @EnvAgencyMids @DefraGovUK @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @AaronBell4NUL to 
@StinkStopthe 
#StoptheStink 
#AirPollution https://t.co/nUbG3ijKA0

@EcolaEvans Thx for letting us know. There are drainage lagoons nearby so perhaps connected to that as a watercourse? @Otter_Project could be interested in bodies for post-mortem - contact info in their bio.

We‚Äôve delivered our largest ever programme of #flood and coastal defence improvements!

Working with partners, we‚Äôve helped protect over 300,000 homes from flooding and supported communities to become more resilient to #ClimateChange

Read more: https://t.co/5Bgax4pg9n

#FCERM https://t.co/mS2pKBFb18

@DrMickSalt @StinkStopthe @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @EnvAgencyMids @DefraGovUK @RedIndustries2 I think each and everyone of us would be happy with that. Inaction by the @EnvAgencyMids @EnvAgencyMids @ClareDinnisEA has led to calls for it to be closed @StinkStopthe #stopthestink

@SouthWestWater @SWWHelp @sascampaigns @EnvAgency have you seen this disgusting mess being pumped out at Swanpool Beach in Falmouth, apparently coming from the new housing estate by Linden Homes. How is this acceptable? This isn‚Äôt a one off and it was happening yesterday too! https://t.co/HwaPPuxZ0z

It been over a week since @EnvAgencyMids did a bit of ‚Äòinstructing‚Äô and there ate still significant foul odour plumes coming from this landfill. When will they  provide an update on the action they intend to take? @AaronBell4NUL @StinkStopthe https://t.co/9nC0Sg0cWc

@ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @EnvAgencyMids @EnvAgency You've made a whole town scared of which way the wind is blowing. #stopthestink #capitoff

https://t.co/BNMHwAXH1F

@ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @EnvAgencyMids @EnvAgency Foul liquids oozing out of the landfillk yet still no action! What are you playing at!!! #stopthestink #capitoff

https://t.co/ErZ6MdBLpt

@ClareDinnisEA , @JamesBevanEA, @EnvAgencyMids & @DefraGovUK. I am one of the few local people not wanting @RedIndustries2 to #CapItOff at Walley‚Äôs Quarry Landfill. All I want is to #StopTheStink, and for that, we need effective regulation from the Environment Agency.

Do you know where the water from your dishwasher, washing machine, bath or shower goes? 

Misconnected properties can pollute rivers and seas and harm wildlife. Check your property is connected right. 

For more info https://t.co/hKtRdkmPtK 

#NationalDrainageMisconnectionDay https://t.co/IJ9CzszydQ

Quite possible THE most complained about odour the EA have ever known yet it's still not classed as an annoyance, why is this @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @EnvAgencyMids @EnvAgency  #stopthestink #capitoff https://t.co/xIj9YlQB8A
@SuzVW @Cap_it_off @RedIndustries2 @EnvAgency @StinkStopthe So so sorry to hear this üò•

Taking leaflets around Clayton Newcastle Under Lyme, and residents are outraged, saddened and despairing at what they see as neglect by @EnvAgencyMids @EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA @DefraGovUK which allows such a travesty of decent living @AaronBell4NUL @NewsNBC @bbcmtd https://t.co/8wVAcOpodL

@ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @EnvAgencyMids @DefraGovUK residents are being poisoned by Walleys landfill. It is an environmental disaster. The toxic gases are killing the environment. How long can you stand back and let this happen? Please help us #capitoff @StinkStopthe https://t.co/YT4MEb6QMr

Dirty water from our homes should go to a water treatment works not into our rivers or seas. Wrongly connected pipes cause pollution and harm wildlife. Make sure you @connectrightUK #NationalDrainageMisconnectionDay #BinIt4Beaches #RainDownTheDrain. https://t.co/PLaKsIqCVi
